text: Mudpie or mud pie can refer to: * Mississippi mud pie, a type of dessert * Mud pie, a non-edible "pie" made of mud made by children for fun * The code name of the game Uru: Ages Beyond Myst ==See also== *Dorodango, a Japanese art form in which earth and water are molded to create a delicate shiny sphere.
title: Mudpie
